sectionNotes: Restricted to Computer Science major(s). Restricted to students with Senior or Graduate class standing.
sectionText: Topic: The course will survey the algorithmic foundations of parallel computing. This includes basic parallel programming models; operation and communication complexity; basic parallel algorithms for linear algebra, FFT, sorting and graph algorithms; networks and routing.  Restrictions:  Restricted to Computer Science major(s). Restricted to students with Senior or Graduate class standing. Prerequisite: CS 374
